headline: Why Align Technology (ALGN) Is Down 5.1% After Missed Guidance and Securities Probe News
summary: In July 2025, Align Technology reported second quarter results that missed both analyst expectations and the company’s own forecasts, prompting revised guidance projecting lower revenues for the next quarter and full year, alongside the announcement of a new securities fraud investigation by Pomerantz LLP into the company’s practices. This series of events has raised new concerns among investors about Align Technology’s transparency and long-term growth outlook, adding a layer of uncertainty...
